title: Land Of Sorrow
narration: A ghastly face looms from the shadows. It's the ruler of Fear Mountain, whom all fear: the legendary necromancer Nuibaba... If that dark spell he traded his soul for leaves his lips just once... All living beings will surely have a quick death. Oh, Alm-- why do you go? On this fearful mountain, what in the world could exist?

dialogue.speaker: Halcyon
dialogue.line: I am Halcyon. Hmm... You have come here seeking the missing Mila? The sword that sealed Mila lies under the Tower of Duma. However... Jedah will not allow you to draw near. If there is anything I can do, I will lend you my power.

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: I have nothing to ask of you. I'd like to help him...

dialogue.speaker: Halcyon
dialogue.line: I understand. I shall bless him with newly awakened powers.

dialogue.speaker: Jedah
dialogue.line: Heheh... Celica. Alm's trapped in the Dragon's Maw. Follow me if you want to save him. If you sacrifice yourselves to lord Duma, Alm's path shall again open up!

dialogue.speaker: Jedah
dialogue.line: Heheh, so you're finally here. This is Duma's Altar, our site of human suffering. Thus, I shall kill you slowly and painfully. Your pain will be Lord Duma's magnificent feast...

dialogue.speaker: Alm
dialogue.line: Ah, Gramps-- what the hell is going on!? How could such an evil man as King Rudolf be my father?!

dialogue.speaker: Mycen
dialogue.line: Alm. Your shock is understandable... But now you are the only remaining heir of Rigel's royal family.

dialogue.speaker: Alm
dialogue.line: But why... Why couldn't I avoid fighting my own father?

dialogue.speaker: Mycen
dialogue.line: Don't cry, Alm... Let me clarify your father's actions. Valentia became divided because of the gods. They have involved themsleves too deeply with mankind's affairs. As a result, the people have lost balance and head for ruin. After some consideration, Rudolf posed as a destroyer to investigate the advent of true heroes in Valentia. I was told this when he placed his newborn child into my hands: "This child will consign himself to hell's fire!" I couldn't refuse him. And so, I left all to fate. Alm. You mustn't let Rudolf's sacrifice be in vain. Go underground and slay the evil god Duma!

conversation.speaker: Halcyon
conversation.line: The Tower of Duma lies just ahead. Take caution.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: You guys saved General Zeke, eh? Though I hate Zofians, I must thank you guys.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: General Jerome was a cruel man. Even this village was sacked until Lord Zeke came.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Just ahead is the Dragon's Maw. The necrodragons there'll tear you apart!

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: General Zeke has no memories of his past. Lady Tatiana found him washed ashore with an awful wound and nursed him back to health.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: This is the hidden Sage's Hamlet. It is protected by Master Halcyon, the Great Sage.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Master Halcyon was the High Priest of Lord Duma. However, he lost a dispute with the shaman Jedah and fled here. If you wish to fight him, there is only one way. On turn 4, 8, 12... Ugh... I... Jedah's spell has...

conversation.speaker: Massena
conversation.line: Prince Albein. I am General Massena, the captain of the king's guards. We have heard our late King's final words and assembled here.

conversation.speaker: Massena Soldiers
conversation.line: Long live King Rudolf the second!

conversation.speaker: Unnamed Sage
conversation.line: Your Highness, please listen to what Lord Mycen has to say.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Alm
recruit-conversation.line: What are you doing imprisoned here?

recruit-conversation.speaker: Tatiana
recruit-conversation.line: My love, Zeke, is a general of Rigelian knights. He opposed the war, however. To ensure he didn't rebel, I was taken hostage. If Zeke sees me rescued, I'm sure he'll gladly help you.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Zeke
recruit-conversation.line: You're Alm, the one who saved Tatiana, aren't you? Thank you kindly.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Alm
recruit-conversation.line: General Zeke, you oppose this war, correct? Please, join our cause.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Zeke
recruit-conversation.line: I cannot. I only helped you fight Jerome because he made my people suffer greatly. Besides... I don't know who I am. All I can remember is that I washed up on Rigel's shore. To my pitiful self, His Majesty Rudolf gave me a new life. I will not betray him.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Alm
recruit-conversation.line: I understand... Apologies for my rudeness.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Zeke
recruit-conversation.line: No, not at all... Hm!? Alm, what's that mark on your right arm?

recruit-conversation.speaker: Alm
recruit-conversation.line: Mark?... Ah, I've always had this birthmark. What does it...?

recruit-conversation.speaker: Zeke
recruit-conversation.line: I see... His Majesty Rudolf once told me: "Zeke, if you find the one with a cross-shaped birthmark on his right arm, you must dedicate yourself to that person. He will certainly become the savior of all of Valentia..." If this is His Majesty's will, then so be it! Al, I shall fight with you!

recruit-conversation.speaker: Celica
recruit-conversation.line: Bishop Nomah! Why in the world are you here?

recruit-conversation.speaker: Nomah
recruit-conversation.line: I got worried and followed you. Then I accidentally fell down here. Haha, what a folly! Well, from now on, I'm coming along with you. That'll ease my mind.

battle.speaker: Jedah
battle.line: Hehe, cute critter, eh? I didn't expect you to kill it so soon. That brat was named Alm, yes? If you do not wish to lose him, girl... climb the Tower of Duma.

battle.speaker: Rudolf
battle.line: I see, so you've come at last... I leave this to fate now as a knight of Rigel. Men! You have fought well thus far! However... The Rigelian Empire's time has ended. Hear me, all of you! This is my final request. If I should fall, don't interfere. Those remaining should surrender courageously. Do not feel disgraced! Is that clear? Don't die in vain!

battle-talk.speaker: Zeke
battle-talk.line: What? Tatiana was saved? Very well! All troops, engage Jerome's men!

recruit-battle.speaker: Zeke
recruit-battle.line: Well... If I must fight... Forgive me.

boss.speaker: Nuibaba
boss.line: Arise, Medusa! Now is the time you must fulfill your contract with me!

boss.speaker: Dolth
boss.line: ...Gwehehe... Oh, defiled beings who rule this foul swamp, repel these men as Master Jedah ordered! May they fall to the necrodragons that I, Shaman Dolth, summon from the dark realm!

boss.speaker: Rudolf
boss.line: Alm... You've grown up well... Was it no mistake entrusting you to Sir Mycen after all? You figured it out by now, right? Your full name is Albein Alm Rudolf. My... only son... Guh... I have a last request... Use 'Falchion', the holy sword that sealed Mila... Defeat... the evil god... Duma...
